ygData.subject: Info needed on trade skills
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a jewelry maker by trade but I m looking for info on all craft skills. The things I m looking for the most is what you can make at certain ranks and how
ygData.messageBody:
I am a jewelry maker by trade but I'm looking for info on all craft skills.
The things I'm looking for the most is what you can make at certain ranks and
how much they sell for. Any kind of info, be it websites or things you've
found out on your own or things you've heard from friends etc, would be much
appreciated. I'm also looking into forming a traders guild or something like
it on the Rathe server. If your interested in helping e-mail me. Please put
Trade Skills or Trader Guild in the subject so I don't accidentally delete it.

Thankee Much,
Jheriak
Level 11 Gnomish Magician
The Rathe
